snippet: The House speaker told Republicans that he would focus on defending the party’s majority in Congress, while hard-liners urged colleagues to keep backing Mr. Trump....
abstract: House Speaker Paul D Ryan announces that he will no longer defend Donald Trump, telling Republican lawmakers that he will instead focus on defending Republican majority in Congress; announcement sparks strong backlash from Republican caucus, and sharp rebuke from Trump, who then took to Twitter to criticize Ryan.

byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and JONATHAN MARTIN
byline.contributor: Ashley Parker, Matt Flegenheimer and Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The House speaker told Republicans that he would focus on defending the party’s majority in Congress, while hard-liners urged colleagues to keep backing Mr. Trump.

headline.main: Paul Ryan Turns Focus From Donald Trump to House Races, Roiling G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Roiling the G.O.P., Ryan Turns Focus to House Control
